string-array.name: zodiac_characteristics
string-array.item:
Aries (March 21 - April 19)

Element: Fire
Modality: Cardinal
Traits: Energetic, leadership-oriented, and courageous. Loves adventure, competitive, and makes quick decisions. Can be impatient and impulsive at times.

Taurus (April 20 - May 20)

Element: Earth
Modality: Fixed
Traits: Reliable, determined, and patient. Fond of comfort, values art and beauty. Can be resistant to change and stubborn.

Gemini (May 21 - June 20)

Element: Air
Modality: Mutable
Traits: Intelligent, curious, and communicative. Thinks quickly, adaptable, and social. Can be indecisive and superficial at times.

Cancer (June 21 - July 22)

Element: Water
Modality: Cardinal
Traits: Emotional, compassionate, and protective. Devoted to family, intuitive, and has strong empathy. Can be easily offended and withdrawn at times.

Leo (July 23 - August 22)

Element: Fire
Modality: Fixed
Traits: Generous, confident, and a natural leader. Loves to be in the spotlight, creative, and cheerful. Can exhibit prideful and selfish behavior.

Virgo (August 23 - September 22)

Element: Earth
Modality: Mutable
Traits: Meticulous, analytical, and hardworking. Detail-oriented, practical, and organized. Can be critical and overly perfectionistic at times.

Libra (September 23 - October 22)

Element: Air
Modality: Cardinal
Traits: Fair, harmonious, and aesthetic. Seeks balance, social, and charming. Can struggle with decision-making and avoids conflict.

Scorpio (October 23 - November 21)

Element: Water
Modality: Fixed
Traits: Passionate, determined, and intuitive. Mysterious, powerful, and tenacious. Can be jealous and vengeful.

Sagittarius (November 22 - December 21)

Element: Fire
Modality: Mutable
Traits: Adventurous, optimistic, and free-spirited. Philosophical, cheerful, and outspoken. Can be irresponsible and careless at times.

Capricorn (December 22 - January 19)

Element: Earth
Modality: Cardinal
Traits: Disciplined, responsible, and ambitious. Realistic, patient, and hardworking. Can be overly serious and pessimistic.

Aquarius (January 20 - February 18)

Element: Air
Modality: Fixed
Traits: Innovative, independent, and humanitarian. Rational, original, and intuitive. Can be distant and stubborn at times.

Pisces (February 19 - March 20)

Element: Water
Modality: Mutable
Traits: Emotional, compassionate, and dreamy. Artistic, intuitive, and self-sacrificing. Can escape reality and be indecisive.
